personal.name: John Doe
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs and creating user-centered experiences that make a difference.

hero.description: I create beautiful, responsive web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about clean code, user experience, and innovative solutions.

description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or enjoying outdoor activities.
I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user-centered experiences that make a difference.

experience.description: Lead development of scalable web applications serving 100k+ users. Architected microservices infrastructure and mentored junior developers.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization
Led team of 5 developers on major product redesign
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

experience.description: Developed MVP and core features for a fintech startup. Built responsive web applications and RESTful APIs.
achievements: Built entire frontend from scratch using React
Designed and implemented secure payment processing system
Achieved 99.9% uptime for critical financial services

experience.description: Created responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Collaborated with designers and backend developers.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Improved website performance scores by average of 35%
Established component library used across all projects

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with user authentication, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, order management, and analytics.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features. Includes project boards, time tracking, and team chat.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application with location-based forecasts and interactive charts. Features 7-day forecasts, weather maps, and historical data.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for social media metrics with data visualization and reporting features. Integrates with multiple social platforms.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
